channel.description:
Click [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,587347.0.html]here[/URL] for the project thread.
Application format: [code]Name: Age: Experience: Skype: Previous work:[/code]

item.title: [HIRING DEVELOPERS] iTavern - Enjoy the little things!

item.description:

Server is leeched and mr pke01 leeches tutorials amd reposts them aswell
And I am sticking to one main project.

item.title: [HIRING DEVELOPERS] iTavern - Enjoy the little things!
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:26, topic:470003”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=587348.msg4172460#msg4172460 date=1354546263]

I Joined Idk what POS im in He asked me to do something for him i said alright i would do it told him to upload teh files i needed to edit never did said he went out to lunch never came back LOL

i dont recommend this particular member (as a developer) he’s an idiot.

i don’t recommend this retarded ass member as a developer
This server is nothing but a bunch of snippets anyway idc.
[/quote]Lol… Someones a little angry.

What sort of positions are still available? I’m not the best programmer but i can do my fair share. I could help out with ideas for content, I also own a Fujitsu TX150 S7 Server if you run into money issues with hosting (When the time comes)[/quote]

Please add my Skype: itavern.rsps

Read full topic
